title: Incorrect Username or Password bug
body: Hello today when i tried to log in to league of legends it says incorrect username or password, i changed the password via email, and i tried to log in again and is still saying incorrect username or password still account is on my mail i changed it and i tried like 3 times to log on, please i need help, how do i fix it?   {{summoner:7}}

replies.body: This can happen if you're on the wrong region at the login screen.  If that's not the case, don't worry we can help!  Hit us up through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and our account team can help regain access!
